scripts.build-development-android: rm -f build/development-android.apk; npx eas build --profile development --platform android --clear-cache --output ./build/development-android.apk --local
scripts.build-production-android: rm -f build/production-android.aab; npx eas build --profile production --platform android --clear-cache --output ./build/production-android.aab --local
scripts.build-production-preview-android: rm -f build/production-preview-android.apk; npx eas build --profile production-preview --platform android --clear-cache --output ./build/production-preview-android.apk --local
scripts.build-development-ios: rm -f build/development-ios.ipa; npx eas build --profile development --platform ios --clear-cache --output ./build/development-ios.ipa --local
scripts.build-development-simulator-ios: rm -f build/development-simulator-ios.tar.gz; npx eas build --profile development-simulator-ios --platform ios --clear-cache --output ./build/development-simulator-ios.tar.gz --local
scripts.build-production-simulator-ios: rm -f build/production-simulator-ios.tar.gz; npx eas build --profile production-simulator-ios --platform ios --clear-cache --output ./build/production-simulator-ios.tar.gz --local
scripts.build-production-ios: rm -f build/production-ios.ipa; npx eas build --profile production --platform ios --clear-cache --output ./build/production-ios.ipa --local
scripts.build-production-preview-ios: rm -f build/production-preview-ios.ipa; npx eas build --profile production-preview --platform ios --clear-cache --output ./build/production-preview-ios.ipa --local
